question: A restaurant has placed an advertisement for waiters and waitresses in your local newspaper.Write a letter to the restaurant, applying for the job. In your letter:explain what you are currently doingdescribe your suitability for this area of worksay when you can attend an interview
text: I am writing in response to the advertisement for the job in our city newspaper. I want to express my interest in a restaurant job.
Firstly, I am currently studying at Edmonton college so meanwhile, in my spare time I can work as well to overcome my daily expenses because right now I am not doing any work.

Secondly, your restaurant is the right location as this is not as far from my place which would suit me a lot if I get this job. Also, it will be beneficial for you as in the overflow work I can be there within a few mins because my residence is 10 mins away.

Lastly, the evening time will suit me as in the morning time I have to take my university classes, and after completion of my classes, I will come straight to your restaurant for the interview if it is fine for you.
I hope to hear a positive response from you.
